metadata.title: CVE-2018-16427 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Various out of bounds reads when handling responses in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards to potentially crash the opensc library using programs.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16427` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.19.0-1build1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.19.0-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.0-1build1').
